headline.print_headline: Centuries Later, Still Well Versed in Sports
headline.main: Centuries Later, Still Well Versed in Sports

snippet: William Shakespeare died 400 years ago Saturday, an anniversary noted across the sceptered isle and across the pond. And sports, like much else, are in Shakespeare’s debt.
lead_paragraph: William Shakespeare died 400 years ago Saturday, an anniversary noted across the sceptered isle and across the pond. And sports, like much else, are in Shakespeare’s debt.
